about_the_game:
Dive into a world of challenging platforms and enigmatic exploration with Tootum, a 2D game that combines precise jumps with the rich exploration of classic Metroidvania elements.

You embody Tootum, a legendary entity who awakens from a millennia-long slumber with no memory of its past. Trapped in an ancient temple sealed by powerful wizards, Tootum must explore dark corridors, overcome intricate challenges, and discover sacred relics that will reveal the truth about its identity. Every jump, every obstacle, and every discovery brings you closer to unraveling the mysteries surrounding you.

Key Features:

Precise Platforming Challenges: Face trials that demand quick reflexes and accurate jumps as you venture through a temple filled with secrets and dangers.

Metroidvania Exploration: Unlock new abilities and hidden areas as you recover fragments of Tootum's memories, growing stronger and paving the way out of the temple.

Intuitive Narrative: Experience an immersive story; Tootum's journey is told through animations and environmental interactions, offering a rich experience where every detail matters.

Engaging Design: Enjoy a gameplay experience that combines the tension of precise jumps with the satisfaction of exploring a world full of secrets and clever puzzles.

Prepare for a journey where skill and intelligence are key. Uncover Tootum’s secrets and reclaim the power that lies dormant within. The fate of Tootum—and yours—is at stake.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual-core de 2,0 GHz ou superior.
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU com suporte a OpenGL 2.1 (NVIDIA GeForce 6000 Series, AMD Radeon HD 2000 Series, ou equivalente).
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14+
  • Processor: Quad-core de 2.5 GHz ou superior.
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU com suporte a OpenGL 2.1 (NVIDIA GeForce 6000 Series, AMD Radeon HD 2000 Series, ou equivalente).
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
